info.jonclark.treegraft.core.rules
Interface GrammarRule<T extends Token>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Implementing Classes:
MonoCFGRule, SyncCFGRule
public interface GrammarRule<T extends Token>

A basic grammar rule for a monolingual or transduction parser. Other data can easily be placed inside both implementations of GrammarRule (as in synchronous transduction information) and in the Token implementations (e.g. tokens for use in factored translation).

Author:
jon

Method Summary
 void beginEvaluation()
          Begin timing the evaluation of this rule for profiling purposes.
 Constraint[] getConstraints()
          Get the unification constraints assocaited with this GrammarRule.
 java.io.File getFile()
          Get the File in which this GrammarRule was defined.
 int getLength()
          Get the length of the source RHS of this rule in terms of terminal and non-terminal rules.
 T getLhs()
          Get the source-side left hand side of this rule as a non-terminal token.
 int getLineNumber()
          Get the line number of the grammar file on which this GrammarRule was defined.
 double getLogProb()
          Get the score of this rule, in the log probability domain.
 T[] getRhs()
          Get the source-side right hand side of this rule in which terminals and non-terminals can be freely mixed.
 java.lang.String getTimeCost()
          Get the number of seconds consumed by evaluating this rule during the lifetime of this GrammarRule.
 void stopEvaluation()
          Stop timing the evaluation of this rule for profiling purposes.
 

Method Detail

getLhs

T getLhs()
Get the source-side left hand side of this rule as a non-terminal token. e.g. The "S" in "S -> NP VP"

Returns:

getRhs

T[] getRhs()
Get the source-side right hand side of this rule in which terminals and non-terminals can be freely mixed. e.g. The "NP freely VP" in "S -> NP freely VP"

Returns:

getLength

int getLength()
Get the length of the source RHS of this rule in terms of terminal and non-terminal rules.

Returns:
